name: Dream Diary (POLIMI Game Collective, crusciu, BridgeQ, Haruhiro27)
name_original: Dream Diary (POLIMI Game Collective, crusciu, BridgeQ, Haruhiro27)
description:
How to play You have to reach the end of the level. You can use mirrors to create walkable paths. You can move by left-clicking your destination (NOTE: you cannot click on stairs). You can drag and drop a mirror into a different position (marked with blue dots);
some mirrors can also be rotated using A and D.
